# Orders, decorations, and medals of the Democratic Republic of the Congo

awarded to the astronaut Neil Armstrong ]]
Orders, decorations, and medals of the Democratic Republic of the Congo include:
* Order of the National Heroes Kabila-Lumumba (; five classes)
* Medal of Civil Merit (; in gold, silver, or bronze)
* Medal of Arts, Science and Letters Merit (; in gold, silver, or bronze)
* Medal of Sport Merit ()
* Medal  of Agricultural Merit ()
* Medal of Maternal Merit ()
* Medal of Conjugal Merit ()
* Medal of Peace ()
* Soldier of Liberation Medal ()
* Soldier of Liberation Medal (17th of May) ()
* Cross of Military Bravery (; with star or palm)
* Military Cross (; two classes)
* Military Decoration (; two classes)
* Police Bravery Cross (; with star, palm, or clasp)
* Police Cross (; three classes)
* Police Decoration (; two classes)
